Physics (History of Science).subject: Physics (History of Science)
Physics (History of Science).question: Which one of the following Indian scientists was elected as a fellow of the Royal Society of London for his contribution in the field of Plant Physiology and Physics ?
Physics (History of Science).explanation: Jagdish Chandra Bose was elected as a fellow of the Royal Society of London for his contribution in the field of Plant Physiology and Physics.
